title: 06/18/2021 - HOUR 3 - Tomorrow's Headlines Today
itunes:title: 06/18/2021 - HOUR 3 - Tomorrow's Headlines Today
description:
Colin discusses how the NBA Conference Semifinals will finish up with FS1/FSR Host Jason McIntyre in Tomorrow’s Headline’s Today.


Guests:

The Athletic Senior NBA Writer Sam Amick

FOX Sports Digital / FSR / "Straight Fire" Podcast Host Jason McIntyre
